resp = client.search(
    index="my-index-000001",
    query={
        "match": {
            "message": "GET /search"
        }
    },
    collapse={
        "field": "user.id"
    },
    sort=[
        {
            "http.response.bytes": {
                "order": "desc"
            }
        }
    ],
    from_=0,
)
print(resp)
